skills.name: IMMORTAL ORDER
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Inflict Perfect Disable on the target for 3 turns.
• Grant Armor and Magic Penetration to all allies for 2 turns.
• Deal 6 hits of Additional Random Damage based on the target’s MAX HP if there are no beneficial effects on the target.

skills.name: BAPTISM OF FIRE
desc: • Remove Negative Effects, including Silver effects, from all allies.
• Grant Invincibility and Immunity to all allies for 2 turns.
• Inflict 3 stacks of Scalding and Blinding Burns on all enemies for the duration of battle.

skills.name: SACROSANCT
desc: Remove Increased Max HP and Perfect Health from all enemies at the start of battle. Prevent enemies from gaining any new beneficial effects after the first round of battle. Grant Regen to all allies for the duration of battle.
